title: Annual Financial Report
content:
RNS Number : 0730A 
 
Standard Life UK Small.Co's Tst PLC 
 
24 September 2015 
  
Standard Life UK Smaller Companies Trust plc 
 
  
 
Annual Report and Financial Statements for the year ended 30 June 2015 
 
  
 
A copy of the above document has been submitted to the National Storage Mechanism and will shortly be available for inspection at: www.hemscott.com/nsm.do * 
 
  
 
The document is also available for download from the Company's website, using the following link: 
 
  
 
http://www.standardlifeinvestments.com/uksmallercompanies/annualreport * 
 
  
 
  
 
*Neither the National Storage Mechanism website nor the Company's website nor the content of any website accessible from hyperlinks on those websites (or any other website) is (or is deemed to be) incorporated into, or forms (or is deemed to form) part of this announcement. 
 
  
 
  
 
END 
 
  
  

This information is provided by RNS 

The company news service from the London Stock Exchange
